casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Steven Daniel FISHER. No. 356A03. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 16, 2004. Jonathan P. Babb, Special Deputy Attorney General, Thomas H. Lock, District Attorney, for State. Stephen J. Batten, Williamston, Seth H. Jaffe, Raleigh, for ACLU-NC Legal Foundation, Inc.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 11th day of February 2004 by Defendant to Strike Portions of the State's New Brief:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 16th day of February 2004."
